root.name: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Harbinger
root.description: Harbinger was released on MS-Dos (although a patch to make it compatible with Windows was released) and Macintosh platforms. It was release in 1996. Gameplay The game places the player in the shoes of Envoy Bannik who becomes embroiled in an interstellar murder plot shortly after his shuttle craft crashes into Deep Space Nine. The player experiences the game from a first person perspective that also incorporates elements of adventure games (such as conversation trees). The game offers players a break from this with more arcade style shooter sections in between puzzles.
